name: fieldset
description: Options for the fieldset component (e.g. legend).

legend.text: How do you travel to work?

name: hint
description: Options for the hint component (e.g. text).

example.text: Select the item that you use most often for the longest part of your journey

name: errorMessage
description: Options for the errorMessage component (e.g. text).

name: formGroup.classes
description: Classes to add to the form group (e.g. to show error state for the whole group).

name: idPrefix
description: String to prefix id for each checkbox item if no id is specified on each item. If `idPrefix` is not passed, fallback to using the name attribute instead.

name: name
description: Name attribute for each radio item.

params.name: text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text to use within each radio item label. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML to use within each radio item label. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: id
params.description: Specific id attribute for the radio item. If omitted, then `idPrefix` string will be applied.

params.name: label
params.description: Provide attributes and classes to each radio item label.

params.name: hint
params.description: Provide hint to each checkbox item.

params.name: divider
params.description: Divider text to separate radio items, for example the text "or".

params.name: checked
params.description: If true, radio will be checked.

params.name: conditional.html
params.description: Provide content for the conditional reveal.
params.example: <label class="lbh-label govuk-label" for="more_details">Please give more details</label><input class="govuk-input govuk-!-width-one-third" name="more_details" type="text" id="more_details">

params.name: disabled
params.description: If true, radio will be disabled.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the radio input tag.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the radio container.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the radio input tag.
